description: Next in the developer preview release of upcoming 1.0 branch. No guarantees are made for backwards/forwards compatibility.

issues.title: Undo append waiting on region edit/sequence id update
Remove deprecation annotations from mapred namespace
Document improvements to LoadTestTool and PerformanceEvaluation
Avoid usage of KeyValueUtil#ensureKeyValue from Compactor
Support Cell to be passed to StoreFile.Writer rather than KeyValue
Deprecate / Remove HTableUtil
Add CP hooks for ReplicationEndPoint
Document new permission check to roll WAL writer
Change sync to hsync, remove unused InfoServer, and reference our httpserver instead of hadoops
CopyTable with bulkload

Avoid usage of KeyValueUtil#ensureKeyValue in simple cases

Create hbase-annotations module
Fix usage of Collections.toArray

Finish making HFile.Writer Cell-centric; undo APIs that expect KV serializations.

Deprecate KeyValueUtil#ensureKeyValue(s)

bad state after NamespaceUpgrade with reserved table names
